attributes.action: Let drivers pass there theory test as were in lockdown
attributes.additional_details: The pass rate has dropped since the lockdown came into place students are stressing they will never drive so it’s fair if they help them out and pass there theory
attributes.background: Let drivers pass there theory test as were in lock down and it adds stress to drivers wanting to drive

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You might like to sign the following petition:

Make driving theory tests available to take online
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/570878
